metadata.title: CVE-2022-2509 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability found in gnutls. This security flaw happens because of adouble free error occurs during verification of pkcs7 signatures ingnutls_pkcs7_verify function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2509` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnutls-bin - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.1
guile-gnutls - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.1
libgnutls-dane0 - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.1
libgnutls-openssl27 - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.1
libgnutls30 - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.1
libgnutlsxx28 - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.3-4ubuntu1.1').
